summary: Ever wanted the Vendors to be more challenging to haggle and get decent prices? Now you can!
descriptionHtml:
HAPPY NEW YEAR!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27380]Click here to view my more extensive mod![/url]

DESCRIPTION:
This mod makes all vendors stronger so you just can\'t easily kill them and take their money etc.
Makes their skills in speech etc. higher than normal. (Harder Haggling)
Makes them worthy foes in combat if you choose to steal!

Update Log:
1.01
Small bug fix: Vendors stats randomized rapidly


INSTALLATION:
Simply but into your games DATA folder and run with steam ONLY!

Thanks once again and please if you wish endorse me!
author: Jobbomb6
